CustomField.formula:
CASE( Account_Plan_Flow_Header__r.Method__c ,
"Collection Domestic", IF( Account_Plan_Flow_Header__r.isNoTransactions__c ,
IF( NoOfTransaction__c >0,NoOfTransaction__c,0) , Volume__c ) *12
* if( Account_Plan_Flow_Header__r.isFreeCharge__c, if( NOT(ISBLANK(FeeCharge__c)), IF( TEXT(Account_Plan_Flow_Header__r.Fee_Charge_Type__c) ='Number' ,FeeCharge__c*100,FeeCharge__c) ,1)
,0)
, "Collection Export",
IF( Account_Plan_Flow_Header__r.isNoTransactions__c ,
IF( NoOfTransaction__c >0,NoOfTransaction__c,0) , Volume__c)
*12
* if( Account_Plan_Flow_Header__r.isFreeCharge__c, if( NOT(ISBLANK(FeeCharge__c)), IF( TEXT(Account_Plan_Flow_Header__r.Fee_Charge_Type__c) ='Number' ,FeeCharge__c*100,FeeCharge__c) ,1)
,0)
,
"Payment Domestic",
IF( Account_Plan_Flow_Header__r.isNoTransactions__c , IF( NoOfTransaction__c >0,NoOfTransaction__c,0),Volume__c) * 12 * IF( Account_Plan_Flow_Header__r.isFreeCharge__c, if( NOT(ISBLANK(FeeCharge__c)), IF( TEXT(Account_Plan_Flow_Header__r.Fee_Charge_Type__c) ='Number' ,FeeCharge__c*100,FeeCharge__c),1) ,0)
, "Payment Import", if( ISPICKVAL( Account_Plan_Flow_Header__r.Type_of_Fee__c ,'Engagement Fee') , ( TermDays__c /365),1)
*Volume__c *12 * if( Account_Plan_Flow_Header__r.isFreeCharge__c, if( NOT(ISBLANK(FeeCharge__c)), IF( TEXT(Account_Plan_Flow_Header__r.Fee_Charge_Type__c) ='Number' ,FeeCharge__c*100,FeeCharge__c) ,1)
,0)
,
NULL)
CustomField.label: WalletFee
